subject: Re: New member
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Welcome Zack, look forward to your take on the box and other ideas 
given your engineering background.  Read past posts to get an idea of 
what the group is about, i did and learned a lot of information about 
this whole topic.

Listen to the Uploaded Mp3 files in the FILES section and let us know 
what you think of them.  I'm in there under Simple FM Sweep radio 
design and would like to get some feedback.  I got some, but would 
like more.  My radio is a slightly different design than frank's and 
want to know what people think.

Thanx,
-Steve H.




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Laura Kimberley" <gjk1rrfan@...> 
wrote:
>
> Welcome Zack,
> Glad your here and look forward to your thoughts, ideas, opinions 
> and experiments!!!
> Laura
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Zack Widup <w9sz@> wrote:
> >
> > Hi,
> > 
> > I just joined and I thought I'd introduce myself.
> > 
> > I am an electrical engineer, radio amateur and a ghost hunter 
> living in 
> > Urbana, IL. (Well, I like the term "paranormal investigator" 
> better!)
> > 
> > I've gotten a lot of EVP's on a pocket DVR but I found and 
> downloaded the 
> > schematics for Frank's ghost box some months ago.  I'm fascinated 
> by this 
> > idea and I hope I can find the time to build the equipmeont some 
> time 
> > soon. Hopefully I will get beyond the 70-80 hour work weeks I've 
> been 
> > putting in for the last couple months ...
> > 
> > Looking forward to seeing what's happening on this group!
> > 
> > Zack
> >
>
